results.title: Rhythm
results.brief_description:
Episode number 9 of Series “Lessons in visual language”.
Devised and narrated by Peter Thompson. Explores rhythm as a fundamental part of the langauge of motion pictures and its integral role in film making. Addresses: 1. Rhythm does not depend on cutting 2. Changes of shot do not necessarily have any special rhythmic effect 3. Music can impose its own rhythm 4. Music and images can work together.

results.title: Rhonda’s story : spoken by Ada Peterson
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Ada Peterson and ACMI
results.brief_description: Speaking for her sister, Rhonda, Ada Peterson gives us some insight into the anguish and confusion of being a member of the ‘Stolen Generation’. While Rhonda understands too well the psychological trauma experienced by the parents whose children were taken, she doesn’t understand why they refuse to talk about it today.

results.title: Rhodesia and Nyasaland today
results.creator_credit: Gordon Bradley, Rank Organisation Film Productions and Associated Television
results.brief_description: Surveys the progress and problems of Rhodesia and Nyasaland; the African quarter of Harari; tobacco plantations; Government farming schemes; industrial training; Victoria Falls; Kariba power station; Nyasaland’s tea production. Transition of Africans from their way of life to the European pattern.

results.title: Rhino christmas
results.creator_credit: Fiona Cochrane, Armstrong, Cochrane Productions and John Armstrong
results.brief_description: It’s a hot and boringly predictable Christmas Day in the suburbs and Mott wishes it would snow. She’s sick of presents that are educational and of going to the beach with her new-age parents who meditate all day. But then weird things happen in this off beat fantasy.

results.title: Rhine boatmen
results.brief_description: An account of the lives of the 40,000 men and women who live on the boats that trade up and down the Rhine, with some description of the river and its history.

results.title: Rheumatism
results.creator_credit: Mick Rhodes and British Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Horizon”
Describes causes, research and treatment of rheumatic and associated diseases. Discusses the effects it has on the lives of the sufferers plus a detailed look at a hip bone replacement operation
